tns:patch.author: Alexandru Artimon
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_budget_department AS SELECT a.amp_activity_id, (dep.code || ' - ' || dep.name) AS budget_sector, COALESCE(a.budget_department, -1) AS department_id FROM amp_activity_version a JOIN amp_departments dep ON a.budget_department = dep.id_department;
